author: Rowan Cheung
content: Weekly AI wrap: GPT-4o launches, Apple leans into accessibility with eye-tracking, Google’s Project Astra demo lands, and Meta teases Camerabuds.

author: Min Choi
content: Anthropic’s new Computer Use feature is barely 24 hours old and builders already have it auto-skipping YouTube ads, reconciling expenses, and QA’ing workflows.

author: Saif M. Khan
content: Policy deep dive on a rumored NVIDIA B30A export SKU for China—half the Blackwell B300 yet still miles ahead of H20-class chips, and what that means for compute controls.
